clip.quote: My home value is directly tied to the listings that I get. If I give away the listings, it's not going to do my own house any good.
clip.why_clipworthy: This quote highlights a unique perspective on why agents should focus on their local market.
clip.suggested_hook: Why your home value depends on your real estate listings!

script:
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why your home value depends on your real estate listings!",
    "SETUP": "Janine Sasso shares a unique perspective on why focusing on local listings is crucial for agents. It's not just about selling homes.",
    "INSIGHT": "Janine explains, 'My home value is directly tied to the listings that I get. If I give away the listings, it's not going to do my own house any good.' This highlights the importance of maintaining a strong presence in your local market.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Understanding this can transform how you approach geographic farming and lead generation. Focus on local to boost your own property's value.",
    "CTA": "Think about your current strategy. Are you maximizing your local market? Share your thoughts in the comments!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Your home value is linked to your listings. Focus local! #RealEstateTips",
  "HASHTAGS": [
    "#RealEstateTips",
    "#LocalMarket",
    "#GeographicFarming",
    "#HomeValue",
    "#RealEstateStrategy"
  ],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}

clip.quote: Garage sales are a great way to find potential sellers because people often have them when they're preparing to move.
clip.why_clipworthy: This provides a tactical tip that agents can implement immediately.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to find your next seller? Look for garage sales!
